refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: These interfaces (auto-generated from the telepathy spec) make it easier to export the objects used to implement TpSvcChannelTypeStreamedMedia, with the correct method and signal signatures, and emit signals from those objects.

refsect2.title: TpSvcMediaSessionHandler
refsect2.para: Dummy typedef representing any implementation of this interface.

refsect2.title: TpSvcMediaSessionHandlerClass
refsect2.para: The class of TpSvcMediaSessionHandler.

refsect2.title: tp_svc_media_session_handler_error_impl ()
refsect2.programlisting: void (*tp_svc_media_session_handler_error_impl) (TpSvcMediaSessionHandler *self, guint in_Error_Code, const gchar *in_Message, DBusGMethodInvocation *context);
refsect2.para: The signature of an implementation of the D-Bus method Error on interface org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Media.SessionHandler.

listitem.simpara: Used to return values or throw an error

refsect2.title: tp_svc_media_session_handler_implement_error ()
refsect2.para: Register an implementation for the Error method in the vtable of an implementation of this interface. To be called from the interface init function.

listitem.simpara: A class whose instances implement this interface
A callback used to implement the Error D-Bus method

refsect2.title: tp_svc_media_session_handler_return_from_error ()
refsect2.para: Return successfully by calling dbus_g_method_return(). This inline function exists only to provide type-safety.

refsect2.title: tp_svc_media_session_handler_ready_impl ()

listitem.simpara: Used to return values or throw an error

A callback used to implement the Ready D-Bus method

refsect2.para: Return successfully by calling dbus_g_method_return(). This inline function exists only to provide type-safety.

refsect2.title: tp_svc_media_session_handler_emit_new_stream_handler ()
refsect2.programlisting: void tp_svc_media_session_handler_emit_new_stream_handler (gpointer instance, const gchar *arg_Stream_Handler, guint arg_ID, guint arg_Media_Type, guint arg_Direction);
refsect2.para: Type-safe wrapper around g_signal_emit to emit the NewStreamHandler signal on interface org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Media.SessionHandler.
